Class InvoiceJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • InvoiceJDBC

  • public class InvoiceJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to connect to JDBC to retrieve or set Invoices.
    Version:
    final
    Author:
    Team 5

        public void disConnect()

      • getSingleInvoiceFromJDBC

        public Invoice getSingleInvoiceFromJDBC(int newInvoiceID)
        This method retrieves a single Invoice from the Database based on the Invoice ID Num. Author : Ernesto Thermidor
        Parameters:
        newInvoiceID - : Accepts Invoice ID, that needs to be in SQL parameter
        Returns:
        invoiceData : Returns a single invoice object.

      • getInvoiceListFromJDBC

        public java.util.ArrayList<Invoice> getInvoiceListFromJDBC(int select,
                                                  int Days)
        This method returns multiple invoice list based on the select parameter. Author: Ernesto Thermidor
        Parameters:
        select - : An integer parameter to used in switch statement. Allowed Values For Select are: (1) select = 1 For Returning All The invoices in database. (2) select = 2 For Returning Pending Invoices (3) select = 3 For Returning Paid Invoices. (4) select = 4 For Returning paid Invoices Older than the Current Days. Used in combination with the Parameter Days.
        Days - : An integer parameter to hold days used in combination when Parameter select = 4
        Returns:
        invoiceData : Returns an Array List of invoices

      • createInvoiceFromOrderList

        public int createInvoiceFromOrderList(java.lang.String newDate)
        This methods creates Invoices from Orders Database Author : Cyril Thomas
        Parameters:
        newDate - : Accept String Date in format of "yyyy-MM-dd" and pass that value to the SQL parameter.
        Returns:
        -1 if failed or rsInt the # of row created.

      • UpdateInvoiceJDBC

        public int UpdateInvoiceJDBC(Invoice newInvoice)
        This method updates an existing invoice attribute in database. Author: Cyril Thomas
        Parameters:
        newInvoice - : Accept an Invoice Object that hold current or new Invoice values for each attributes.
        Returns:
        affected : Returns the # of rows affected.

      • deleteInvoiceJDBC

        public int deleteInvoiceJDBC(int Days)
        This method deletes Older Invoices determined by how old the paid dates of the Invoices are. Author : Kahliik Burrell
        Parameters:
        Days - : Integer Days that is used to determine old invoices and pass the value to SQL Parameter.
        Returns:
        rowsaffected: Returns how many Invoices where deleted
